name: Peace Dose
description:
Peace Dose is an endless platformer game in which you play as a crazy time traveler. You are faced with an impossible task - you need to survive! Due to an error in the code, our hero was brought into a strange acidic dimension with a thousand portals, each of them leads to different corners of the galaxy, but only one back to reality, try not to die and find the necessary portal.

Features:
- Beautiful pixel graphics.
- Nice sound track.
- Retrowave.
- Lack of advertising.
- Endless game play.
